short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OpenSourced ChatGPT downloader in markdown format. Download all text or markdown-styled code blocks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fear no more that servers are down, under high load or OpenAI adding a new feature. Keep all yours chat's with you locally in the simple .md files.
